full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Project Title
ED001-250014: Ventilation Retrofit – Charlottetown Research and Development Centre

#### Reference Number
WS4601689353-Doc4601752214

#### Tender Status
**Expired**

#### Key Information
* Tender:  Ventilation retrofit of Charlottetown Research and Development Centre, Agriculture and Agrifood Canada
* Location: Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island
* Estimated value: C$5,000,001 to C$20,000,000
* Contract period: 80 weeks from contract award
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price

#### Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit their tenders for the ventilation upgrade at the Agriculture and Agrifood Canada's Charlottetown Research and Development Centre in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island. This project entails the renovation of major mechanical systems for Building A and associated electrical, mechanical, controls, architectural, and structural systems that support the mechanical modifications.

The estimated value of the contract ranges from C$5,000,001 to C$20,000,000. Bid security will be required during the second phase. Suppliers are advised to ensure their tender meets the specified requirements, including a detailedscope of work, price quotation, and other supporting documents.

Please find the detailed tender document at the following URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19800471?extsite=MTk4MDA0NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19800471?extsite=MTk4MDA0NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The closing date for the tender is [2024-06-11T14:00:00](mailto:beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

Enquiries regarding the tender should be directed to: [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

We look forward to receiving your tender. You also have the opportunity to ask the contact if there are some more documents you can request, they will be able to provide you with the necessary paperwork. 

This tender is announced on [2024-05-23](mailto:beaumaster@tpsg
